Name: Devils Gold
About the game: About This Game 'Play the role of a merchant, find way to repay the devil's loan while training your fighting skills for inevitable battles to come.' In this fantasy RPG, you will play the role of Jeremy - was just an ordinary man like any others. Until he died and ran into a devil. The devil offered to give Jeremy a second life. In return, he must pay back 1000 times the money that the devil lent him within 60 days, otherwise his soul would belong to her. We all know how cunning the devil is and Jeremy soon discovers that things are not as simple as he thought. Key Features - Emotional story. - Classical feeling RPG. - Trader simulation.
